about_the_game:
The year is 3031, and what a time it is for human kind or human waste. Joe the Hacker is on board his ship with AND10 and on the run from the Global police for hacking crimes. Your mission on this demo is to save Joe from capture using the Android And10 and Tara. Help Joe escape by finding him and by defeating the Global police.

Equiped with weapons and combat programming And10 is ready for destroying enemies in this all out action title.

This demo features one level of the game.  The demo features advanced game mechanics such as recharging the Android inside a chamber after taking several hits from the enemy.

Within the demo's UI, you can add your name to personalise the experience and change Character to discover new areas of the map.

Dive into the Future with AND10! 🚀

Get ready to immerse yourself in the neon-lit, cyberpunk world of AND10, the latest action-adventure game that’s taking the gaming community by storm! 🌐✨

🔄 Character Change Functionality: Seamlessly switch between characters to adapt to any challenge the dystopian future throws at you.

🤖 Play as an Android: Experience the thrill of playing as a highly advanced android, complete with recharging capabilities to keep you in the fight longer.

💥 Massive Plasma Cannon: Unleash devastating power with your massive plasma cannon, perfect for taking down the toughest enemies.

Join the revolution and become a part of the cyberpunk saga. Are you ready to change the game? 🎮🔥

PATCH UPDATE - 11.1.25 -A new patch has been released contained within the full game download.

New Features and Bugs resolved

NEW Pause menu - Featuring Audio and Graphics controlls 

NEW Instruction UI - Advises the player the controls at the start of the game in an attractive consol

NEW Additional back to game button in the inventory UI and Exit to main menu button

NEW Walk animation and faster walking and running ability

NEW Enemy AI range altered to seek and shoot at a further range 

NEW Game UI that advises if a door is locked

NEW Game over UI once player dies with fade to black and respawn

NEW Game main menu background environment updated
detailed_description:
The year is 3031, and what a time it is for human kind or human waste. Joe the Hacker is on board his ship with AND10 and on the run from the Global police for hacking crimes. Your mission on this demo is to save Joe from capture using the Android And10 and Tara. Help Joe escape by finding him and by defeating the Global police.

Equiped with weapons and combat programming And10 is ready for destroying enemies in this all out action title.

This demo features one level of the game.  The demo features advanced game mechanics such as recharging the Android inside a chamber after taking several hits from the enemy.

Within the demo's UI, you can add your name to personalise the experience and change Character to discover new areas of the map.

Dive into the Future with AND10! 🚀

Get ready to immerse yourself in the neon-lit, cyberpunk world of AND10, the latest action-adventure game that’s taking the gaming community by storm! 🌐✨

🔄 Character Change Functionality: Seamlessly switch between characters to adapt to any challenge the dystopian future throws at you.

🤖 Play as an Android: Experience the thrill of playing as a highly advanced android, complete with recharging capabilities to keep you in the fight longer.

💥 Massive Plasma Cannon: Unleash devastating power with your massive plasma cannon, perfect for taking down the toughest enemies.

Join the revolution and become a part of the cyberpunk saga. Are you ready to change the game? 🎮🔥

New Features and Bugs resolved

NEW Pause menu - Featuring Audio and Graphics controlls 

NEW Instruction UI - Advises the player the controls at the start of the game in an attractive consol

NEW Additional back to game button in the inventory UI and Exit to main menu button

NEW Walk animation and faster walking and running ability

NEW Enemy AI range altered to seek and shoot at a further range 

NEW Game UI that advises if a door is locked

NEW Game over UI once player dies with fade to black and respawn

NEW Game main menu background environment updated
legal_notice: All Copywrite of assets created within AND10 belong to 100 Percent Games. Any unlawful copying in the form of screen capture without the authority of 100 Percent Games will take legal action against.
name: AND10 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: intel core i8
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 3080, AMD Radeon RX 6750 XT
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Nvidia Virtual Sound
  • Additional Notes: A PC using the minimum system requirements may require the player to reduce the graphical settings in game to help reduce game lag from Epic down to medium or even low in some cases.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: intel core i9
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 4080 ti, AMD Radeon RX 7800 XT
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Nvidia Virtual Sound

short_description: Sci-fi Cyberpunk action adventure third person shooter game. Use advanced game mechanics to recharge the android and character change to advance into the fight to save your creator Joe the Hacker.
